pullRequest.title: feat(obligation): Rename product obligation to project obligation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Rename product obligation to project obligation

Which issue is this pull request belonging to and how is it solving it? (#998)
Did you add or update any new dependencies that are required for your change? - No


How To Test?


Obligation previously with obligationLevel - PRODUCT_OBLIGATION should be now PROJECT_OBLIGATION
Create new obligation of  obligationLevel  - PROJECT_OBLIGATION and validate
Create Project clearing Report and validate



Have you implemented any additional tests? - No

Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

Signed-off-by: Jaideep Palit jaideep.palit@siemens.com

nodes.bodyText: There is already a key with name project.obligation. Same for Language_vi.properties

 project.name=Project name

 project.namelinks=Project NameLinks
+project.obligation=Project Obligation
